dcterms:creator: D. Demner-Fushman
et al.
dcterms:description: A public dataset from Indiana University Hospital that includes chest X-ray images from approximately 3500 unique patients, accompanied by corresponding reports. A subset of 494 images was annotated for findings such as cardiomegaly and nodules.
dcterms:title: Indiana University Hospital Chest X-ray Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Wang
Y. Peng
L. Lu
Z. Lu
M. Bagheri
R. M. Summers
dcterms:description: A public collection of chest X-ray images released by the National Institutes of Health (NIH), comprising 112,120 frontal-view X-rays. It includes images with various findings and labels, but lacks image-level annotations.
dcterms:title: Chest-Xray14 Dataset
